    • doMROnTableTest

      protected static org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool doMROnTableTest(HBaseTestingUtil util, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName table, String family, String data, Map<String,String> args) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • doMROnTableTest

      protected static org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool doMROnTableTest(HBaseTestingUtil util, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName table, String family, String data, Map<String,String> args, int valueMultiplier, int expectedKVCount) throws Exception
      Run an ImportTsv job and perform basic validation on the results. Returns the ImportTsv Tool instance so that other tests can inspect it for further validation as necessary. This method is static to insure non-reliance on instance's util/conf facilities.
      Parameters:
      args - Any arguments to pass BEFORE inputFile path is appended.
      Returns:
      The Tool instance used to run the test.
      Throws:
      Exception
